resource_uri.description: link to the resource (currently it is the link to the parent transaction)

resource_id.description: id of the resource (currently denotes which resource within the transaction)

mime_type.description: mime type that the document should be rendered as

document_type.description: indicates the document or report type to be generated from the resource data. Currently not implemented

size.description: value to denote the size of the document stored in bytes

description_values.description: a map of key/value pairs used to complete the looked up description identifier enum to turn it into a full description

location.description: location that the document has been stored
